events.message: The candidate has submitted their application for the software engineer position, highlighting five years of experience developing scalable backend systems.
After reviewing the application, we have categorized this candidate under Engineering as a backend developer with experience in distributed systems.
Recruiter Alice Johnson has been assigned to manage this candidate's selection process to ensure smooth communication and updates.
Initial screening call completed successfully, candidate demonstrated strong understanding of algorithms and system design principles.
Candidate responded promptly expressing enthusiasm about the role and confirming availability for a technical interview next week.
Technical interview has been planned for 2024-05-10 at 14:00 UTC, focusing on coding challenges and system architecture.
Candidate completed the technical interview with strong problem-solving skills, demonstrating clear and efficient code during the session.
HR interview scheduled for 2024-05-13 to discuss company culture fit, benefits, and candidateâ€™s career aspirations.
